mapper.insert: INSERT INTO social_media_record (vendor_record_id, vendor_record_parent_id, message, record_type, vendor_type, vendor_record_created_time, place_id, place_name, place_city, place_country, place_zip, place_latitude, place_longitude) VALUES (#{vendorRecordId}, #{vendorRecordParentId}, #{message}, #{recordType}, #{vendorType}, #{vendorRecordCreatedTime}, #{placeId}, #{placeName}, #{placeCity}, #{placeCountry}, #{placeZip}, #{placeLatitude}, #{placeLongitude});
